title: Kinetic & Thermal Damage
contents: Most weapons deal damage through kinetic means (bullets, rockets, etc.), and are therefore affected by standard kinetic armor plating.
However, some weapons instead deal thermal damage, which is unaffected by a target's kinetic armor.
Instead, thermal weapons are mitigated by a target's thermal armor.
A unit's kinetic and thermal armor can be seen in the design menu, on the body selection screen.
Note that all units have less thermal armor than kinetic armor. This means thermal damage will be reduced less than kinetic damage!
